question: can you tell us how many wifes did our prophet mohammad had and what were their names.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) had 11 wives; 1) Khadijah, 2)
Aaishah, 3) Hafsah, 4) Umm-e-Habeebah, 5) Umm-e-Salmah, 6) Sawdah, 7)
Zainab, 8) Maymoonah, 9) Juwayriyah, 10) Safiyyah, 11) Ummul Masaakeen
Zaynab bin Khuzaymah

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
